question: Akhtar Ali, who passed away recently, was the former India coach of which sports?
explanation:
Former India tennis coach Akhtar Ali passed away at the age of 81. He also represented India in Davis Cup between 1958 and 1964.
Akhtar Ali served as the National tennis team coach for a long duration from 1966 to 1993. The veteran coach was conferred the Arjuna Award in the year 2000 for his significant contribution to tennis.
